section.title: root
section.p: This specifies all of the elements which are combined to form a CVSROOT. They are split out into separate entities so that each can be individually overridden in a workspace definition. When an entity is listed as required below, it means that when all of the definitions are combined the entity must have a value - a workspace or profile, for example, only needs to contain the values which it overrides.

section.title: root
section.p: This specifies all of the elements which are combined to communicate with a Perforce server. They are split out into separate entities so that each can be individually overridden in a workspace definition. When an entity is listed as required below, it means that when all of the definitions are combined the entity must have a value - a workspace or profile, for example, only needs to contain the values which it overrides.

tr.td: A Perforce clientspec is a set of mappings from server paths to local paths. The Perforce server keeps track of what files are "current" in a particular clientspec; as a result, a clientspec cannot be shared across Gump instances. It is recommended to set the allwrite option in the clientspec.
